text: The British forced China to sign the Treaty of Nanking after China lost the First Opium War in 1842. The treaty stated that China had to give Britain Hong Kong, 2 billion dollars cash, and open 5 port cities. This led China to give up sovereignty to Europe. ==References== Category:19th century in China Category:Treaties of China Category:1840s treaties Category:Treaties of the United Kingdom Category:1842
title: Treaty of Nanking
